scripts.Invoke_Local: cd ../../../ && npx serverless invoke local -f sys_Process -s local

scripts.Invoke_Local_: cd ../../../ && npx serverless invoke local -f sys_Process -s dev

scripts.DC_ON__Invoke_Local_: set DEV_CONSOLE_ON=1&& cd ../../../ && npx serverless invoke local -f sys_Process -s dev
